import React from 'react' import { Card, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import '../App.css' import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css' const ContactCard = ({ contact, user, handleDelete }) => { const handleClick = () => { handleDelete(contact.id) } return (
Contact {contact.id} {contact.name}
  • Phone: {contact.phone_number}
  • Address: {contact.address}

    •
    ) } export default ContactCard
